snippet.title: Ninjala - Gameplay Trailer #1
snippet.description:
Hungry for some Ninjala action? Then check out our first gameplay reveal trailer!

In this video, you’ll get a taste of the heart-pounding ninja hijinks to be had when Ninjala releases in North America on June 24, 2020!

See the entire cast of customizable characters!
Soar to new heights with high-flying parkour mechanics!
Blend in with your surroundings to surprise your unwitting foes!
Clash with your opponents to find out whose ninja instincts are sharpest, then use devastating ninjutsu techniques to really stick it to ‘em!

About Ninjala 
 
Ninjala is a free-to-play online Ninja-Gum Action game featuring a colorful cast of young ninjas who engage in dynamic battles while free-running across vast environments. Create a custom avatar and wield a variety of special items and abilities, highlighted by the use of wacky, distinctive “Ninja-Gum” weapons and ninjutsu techniques. Cement your supremacy in the free-for-all Battle Royale mode, or work together with friends in 4v4 team matches. Ninjala is available now for the Nintendo Switch. 

IPPON!
 
Official Site: https://bit.ly/NinjalaOfficial
Twitter: https://bit.ly/NinjalaTweets
Facebook: https://bit.ly/NinjalaFB
Instagram: https://bit.ly/NinjalaInsta
Twitch: https://bit.ly/NinjalaTwitch

#Ninjala #GungHo #NintendoSwitch
